summary: This mod changes most of dragon textures and sounds to engineer/vagineer sounds from Team Fortress 2
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes most of dragon textures and sounds to engineer/vagineer sounds from Team Fortress 2.

Note that this mod is still in beta. I will add more sounds and textures in the future.

VIDEO SHOWING THE MOD
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uE5_SVgv8FY

[b] WHAT THIS MOD DOES [/b]
-Changes textures of most dragons
-Changes most sounds of dragons
-Destroys your ears

[b] WHAT THIS MOD DOESN\'T DO [/b]
-Change dragon models
-Change anything in dragon scripting and behaviour
-Add any new animations for dragons

To install put folders \"sound\" and \"Textrues\" in \"Data\" folder in your Skyrim directory




[b] PLANNED FEATURES [/b]
-Earrape shouts
-Hard hat models for dragons
-New armor set and new weapon
-Some new items










[b] CHANGELOG [/b]

BETA 1.0
-Changed textures of regular, blood and elder dragons, odahviing, paarthurnax and alduin
-Changed most sounds of dragons (except distant sounds, dialogues, killmove sounds, shouts [this is a bug] and bites)
-Mod released

[b] !WARNING! 
The sound that plays when you absorb a dragon\'s soul is incredibly loud so turning your sound to minimum is advised [/b]
author: Wunf
